 2011-06072011-05-31,  ,  ,  DFAIT, 
PrecisAppointment of the Honourable LAURIE HAWN of Edmonton, Alberta, as Chairman of the Canadian Section of the Canada-United States Permanent Joint Board on Defence in the place of Rick Casson; and authorizes the Honourable LAURIE HAWN, Member of Parliament for the electoral district of Edmonton Centre, to undertake such travel as may be necessary for the purposes of the above appointment.
